data: The organization FutureTech Summit is a conference.
The organization FutureTech Summit operates in the technology industry and focuses on emerging technologies such as AI, blockchain, IoT, and cybersecurity.
The organization FutureTech Summit is headquartered at Messe Berlin, Messedamm 22 in Berlin, Germany.
The organization FutureTech Summit brings together industry leaders, innovators, and entrepreneurs for keynote presentations, panel discussions, and hands-on workshops over three days.
The organization FutureTech Summit provides networking events and startup pitches to facilitate connections between attendees, investors, and collaborators.
The organization FutureTech Summit has hosted over 10,000 participants from around the globe since its establishment in 2018.
